requirements: Non-competes RESTRICTED - statutory requirements apply

Nevada restricts non-competes: (1) employee must be provided consideration (salary/benefit) beyond continued employment, (2) cannot exceed 1 year for non-supervisory/non-executive employees earning less than statutory threshold, (3) must be reasonable in scope and necessary to protect legitimate business interest.
Best practice: Provide additional consideration, limit to 1 year for lower-earning employees
Action required: Ensure statutory requirements met: consideration provided, 1-year limit for non-executives under threshold
laws.notes: Nevada restricts non-competes: (1) employee must be provided consideration (salary/benefit) beyond continued employment, (2) cannot exceed 1 year for non-supervisory/non-executive employees earning less than statutory threshold, (3) must be reasonable in scope and necessary to protect legitimate business interest.
